title: Amaryllis
alternative_title: アマリリス ; 孤挺花 ; 아마리리스
status: アマリリス ; 孤挺花 ; 아마리리스
description:
Description :
        An anthology of five short stories written by Teppei Fukushima, the author of Samurai Usagi and Bokura wa Mahou Shounen, that deal with darker themes generally regarding romance and sexuality.
